document_data.name: Loviatar's Caress
document_data.mainbody: '''''Loviatar's caress''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] used by priests devoted to [[Loviatar]], enabling them to succeed with a touch spell.
document_data.Effects: This spell ensured that the following touch-based spell would always succeed. The target spell needed to be cast immediately after ''Loviatar's caress''. This spell could also be used with the priest's ''pain touch'' ability.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
